enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: The Secretariat introduced a note on compilation and synthesis of fourth national communications (FCCC/SBI/2007/INF.6 & Adds.1-2).

A contact group, co-chaired by Sushma Gera (Canada) and Hongwei Yang (China), was established. SBI took note of a report on national inventory data from Annex I parties in 1990-2005 (FCCC/SBI/2007/30) and a status report on the review of fourth national communications (FCCC/SBI/2007/INF.8).
